allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Mosca con footprint, dashboard y tests

- Mosca expandida mostrando el footprintId \(ESB-XXXXXXXX\)
- Dashboard configuráu con rutas protexíes
- Tests pa SDK \(13\) y Dashboard \(15\)
- Dockerfile multi-stage pa compilar dashboard
- Eliminaos node_modules del repo
- Correxíu .gitignore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
